articles.title: Steve Fletcher shares concern over Jay Blades and King Charles meeting: 'Oh my word' - Express
articles.description: Steve Fletcher opened up about fears he had as he watched The Repair Shop co-star Jay Blades meeting King Charles III, admitting the royal's officials had to intervene following Jay's interactions with the monarch.
